summary: Enthusiastic customer service/telesales representative with in-depth knowledge of sales, account management and training. Results-driven manager with proven ability to establish rapport with clients. Energetic, highly organized professional skilled at multi-tasking, balancing client needs and driving sales.

experience.title: Manager / Fitness Instructor
experience.description: Cultivated positive relationships with participants; instructed group fitness classes; promoted safety; trained staff; educated clients on exercise during travel; reviewed weekly sales numbers and club statistics to identify areas for improvement.

experience.title: Cocktail Waitress
experience.description: Maintained knowledge of menu items and beverages; provided exceptional service; resolved situations with intoxicated guests; upsold products; created a warm atmosphere.

experience.title: Waitress
experience.description: Monitored dining room for seating and safety; maintained menu knowledge; promoted items; ensured cleanliness and sanitation; delivered professional, friendly service.

experience.title: Waitress
experience.description: Provided professional service; promoted restaurant items; built positive working relationships; delivered attentive service.

experience.title: Waitress / Cocktail Server / Beer Tub
experience.description: Greeted and served customers; maintained knowledge of menu and garnishes; suggested additional items to increase sales; participated in bar incentives.
